CustomField.description: Repurposed this field as part of ticket https://gumgum.jira.com/browse/SOP-2091
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Checking this box commits an open opportunity into a seller's "Forecasted In" Pledge for the current pledge cycle. The box can be checked either in Salesforce or in Clari with a bidirectional sync across both systems.
CustomField.label: Forecasted In
